com.github.fengtan.sophie.composites

Class AbstractSortableTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.fengtan.sophie.composites.AbstractSortableTable
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CoresTable, FieldsTable

    public abstract class AbstractSortableTable
extends Object
    Instantiate a non-virtual table and provide a sortable behavior. Subclasses are expected to use the protected methods in this class to add columns/rows.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractSortableTable(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite composite)
      Instantiate a non-virtual table and provide a sortable behavior.
      AbstractSortableTable(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite composite, org.eclipse.swt.events.SelectionListener listener)
      Instantiate a non-virtual table and provide a sortable behavior.

    • Method Summary

      Add a new column to the table.

      Get the currently selected row.

      Whether the table already contains a column with a specific name.

      • hasColumn

        protected boolean hasColumn(String columnName)
        Whether the table already contains a column with a specific name.
        Parameters:
        columnName - Column name.
        Returns:
        True if the table already contains a column with this name, false otherwise.

      • addColumn

        protected org.eclipse.swt.widgets.TableColumn addColumn(String columnName)
        Add a new column to the table.
        Parameters:
        columnName - Column name.
        Returns:
        The newly created column.

      • addRow

        protected org.eclipse.swt.widgets.TableItem addRow(Map<String,String> values)
        Add a new row to the table.
        Parameters:
        values - Row values keyed by column name.
        Returns:
        The newly created row.

      • refresh

        public void refresh()
             throws SophieException
        Clear the table and re-populate it.
        Throws:
        SophieException - If the table could not be populated.
